#summary list of current & up-coming features
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements,Phase-Support

= current features =
  * simple scene creation
  * 3 primitive types
  * plenty of styling option on vector based primitives
  * integrates well with a variety of tween engines
  * standard 3D isometric positional sorting

= features currently in development (items in bold are top-priorities) =
  * *as3isolib.display.IsoMovieClip* - will allow users to utilize their raster-based content
  * xml scene data parser - for easy scene creation
  * world editor tool for easy xml-based scene creation (will not be a part of the as3isolib rather it will reside in its own project)
  * scene renderer classes optimized specifically for animation

= future features =
  * advanced shadow renderers
  * as3isolib-specific collision detection
  * optimization geared towards caching both static and animated sprite assets
  * asset loader - to be used in conjunction with the world editor tool
